abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Vietnamese restaurant District Saigon in Astoria, Queens.
lead_paragraph: A new Vietnamese restaurant in Astoria, Queens, simmers its pho with patience and attention to ingredients.

headline.main: The Secret to District Saigon’s Broths: Slow Cooking
headline.print_headline: A Long Time, Well Spent, With Pho

snippet: A new Vietnamese restaurant in Astoria, Queens, simmers its pho with patience and attention to ingredients.
